segments.text: This is heartbreaking; the family is so close to disaster without knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is diligently drying that plate, missing all the signs of trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflowing from the sink, soaking everything, and she's just unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are risking it all for some cookies, and it could end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks so unstable; a fall would be devastating for the little boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, so innocent and expectant, not seeing the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside contrasts with this impending sadness inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets getting damaged, floor slipperyâ€”it's all so avoidable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang watching them sneak treats in secret.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can't moments like this just stay simple and safe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dish towel in her hands seems symbolic of routine turning tragic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor things; I hope it doesn't end badly.
